_edge.queryString: (string) query string to be appended to url
_edge.tokenLocation: (string) query | cookie | header , token string location of HTTP request
_edge.ignoreQueryString: (bool) ignore query string from edge auth token validation
_edge.salt: (string) additional salt key used with key
_edge.key: (string) edge's token key. this should be same with generator options' key

a.accessList: (Array of string(s)) valid access list. ex) ['/p1/*','/p2/*']. [one of url or accessList required]
a.delimiter: (string) delimiter character to delimit each token properties [default: '~']
a.endTime: (string/Number/Date) 'now' | epoch seconds | Date object, valid start time
a.escapeEarlyUpper: (bool) escape string in token and tranform escaped hex string to upper case [default: false]
a.startTime: (string/Number/Date) 'now' | epoch seconds | Date object, valid start time, [default: 'now']
a.url: (string) valid url [one of url or accessList required]
a.windowSeconds: (Number) valid time window from startTime in seconds [startTime override windowSeconds]

expect.code: (array) expected response code from edge server
